website_summaries.verdict: These solid, comfortable running shoes are generally less expensive than comparable shoes, although sizing can run a little large.
pros: Great running shoes at a great value
These shoes earn high praise for their lightweight design and comfortable fit
The soles grip wet surfaces particularly well
cons: The shoes offer very little in terms of arch support
Some also claim they run a little large

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shoes. I wear them mostly for running, but have worn them all day on weekends. They are comfortable, not too tight and not too loose, they fit exactly as expected, from the size I chose. I run 3 miles, 4 to 5 times a week, and would highly recommend them such.
customer_reviews.author: Xfertime

customer_reviews.title: After one week of these I'm done with Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my Nike runners, and I'm wondering why I paid more for shoes that weren't nearly as good as these! I've had these about a week and after a very short breakin period walking around in them have worn them on several runs ranging from 1 mile to a 5k, and they feel great. They're also great to wear weightlifting, and just casual wear as well. If these shoes last a while this may be my new go to shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bloom

customer_reviews.title: 'Very cool looking and feel good on' says my 9 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 9 year old son ( who now needs men's size shoes!). I previously got him Ascics and the size 8 worked well, but I wasn't sure the Reeboks in the same size would fit as well. Well, I took a chance and ordered the 8 after all and oh my goodness! Fit like a darn glove! I feel like a super ninja mom now. For scoring a VERY cool looking shoe that FITS perrrrrrfectly! They look so good, and he says they feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, love it, wear it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, I originally bought a pair in store and 3 days later I loved the shoe so much I hopped on amazon and bought another pair just to have for down the road!! They fit my feet perfect, I coach football and these really allow me to run around the field with no hesitations. The inside of this shoe feels..... simply... amazing, I really can't believe I found a shoe I love this much.
customer_reviews.author: NoblesTx

customer_reviews.title: Some good running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these Reebok shoes for about 6 months now and have to say they are some truly amazing running/everyday wear shoes. The only problem I have with these shoes is the sole is a bit weak and I will most likely need new shoes within another two months. If you are a runner I recommend these shoes as they are mostly comfortable to wear for a long distance run. These shoes even have a good grip on wet surfaces. I run on the track sometimes and as expected these shoes do not slip up on the track surface. I'm currently looking into buying a new pair of reebok running shoes! Highly recommend to runners and daily wearers alike!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. they replaced Nike Fury's and there isn't even a comparison! these shoes are made tough,comfortable,extra support all over, and just awesome to look at. for me they run just slightly big, maybe a little less than a half size. I will never go back to Nike after owning these. I can run 4 miles with these and nothing hurts after, not the case with my Nike's. just ordered some for my wife. I now have a pair of Nike's for sale!
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes. They fit perfectly, cost $50 less than the comparable Nike-brand shoes I was also considering, and they look and feel great. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Saint_Chris

customer_reviews.title: light, airy, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived just before vacation. I wanted so badly to bring them with me because they felt so great but I learned a long time ago that you should never wear new shoes when you travel. Well, I didn't bring them but I've been wearing them frequently since I returned. Light weight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. I like them
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shoes for one week now and I should say, I am happy with my purchase. The shoe is really good for running in the roads, light feel to them and breathable fabric makes its really good. Shoe seems to be of good quality and is good for office wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my first half marathon, no blisters and quite comfortable, after a lot of running my foot is beginning to slide around a bit inside the shoe. Mostly left to right.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: This cushioning is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my fiance and he absolutely loves them - says they're the most comfortable shoe he's ever had. He's on his feet a lot during the day and since these shoes are super cushiony, his feet don't hurt when he comes home from work. Really cool looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Thus is my second pair. I run on paved tracks. You will be surprised by the comfort and light weight for the low price. The Z print grips like crazy and gives a lot of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ok

customer_reviews.title: Just as comfortable as my nikes
customer_reviews.text: These reeboks are great, I traded up from an older pair of nikes I had, the nikes were old nut these things are very comfortable, my go to walking / running shoe. Also the nikes were 125 bucks these were around 40
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeeee them!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, I've got multiple compliments on them because they look good too. They're super comfortable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Vicente Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: still a good shoe for workouts just wasn't what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bulkier then I expected, still a good shoe for workouts just wasn't what I was looking for. These weren't as snug to my foot as I wanted them to be
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Hi i am usually US size 10 when it comes to shoes but I have found these shoes extremely painful to run with onlu later to realize the size 11 fits like a glove.... I was wondering if you could work something out to help me exchange the correct size?

customer_reviews.title: Bummed the only have 2 colors in my size
customer_reviews.text: I really wish they would stock more of the colors in my size I would definitely buy more they are super comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable tennis show I have ever worn. Will buy again when I wear my current pair out.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if I would like these but this is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like these but this is my second pair. I love the white. Fit great, comfortable for working out and running.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Zane

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow what a feeling. Almost like only socks on. Feels vented and perfect fit. Did my ten miles and happy w these shoes, thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: jared henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes....
customer_reviews.text: I was never a Reebok fan....I only tried these on because I liked the way they looked. I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they are. I might actually buy them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect....nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: As always with Reebok they all fit almost the same if you already have another pair.....like I do. Love the shoe.....very comfortable and a great walking shoe. Almost don't want to wear my work shoes and wear these instead sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Slightly loose fit out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I like the support from the sole and the overall length is a good fit but the width is a little too narrow. The shoe doesn't seem to hold my foot in place while running. This may improve over continued use if the mesh material stretches a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Slippery/Not enough grip and not comfortable!. Use this item for 2 weeks and only get worst... my feet keep developing blisters due to this shoes....horrible
customer_reviews.author: M Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fit and solid underfoot foundation
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Exceeded all expectations. Light weight, comfortable fit and solid underfoot foundation. Plus the shoe looks so COOL!
customer_reviews.author: David T. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Big bump at the sole
customer_reviews.text: Theres a big air bubble/bump at the sole of the left shoes that I can feel every step I make. Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: MannyT

customer_reviews.title: Sole Pinches - Slightly too Large in Heel
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem is that the sole slightly pinches the bottom of the foot against the right heel wall of the shoe each time I step. Of course, on a 5 mile run this makes for a very sore spot at best, a blister at worst.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These might be the most comfortable gym shoes I've ever worn. I don't wear them for running so can't offer an opinion there, but they are exceptionally comfortable for walking or for being on your feet all day. I will be buying another pair or two soon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes, that look great. Not heavy and they do not quite look like a tennis shoe which can be bulky. I wear them daily and they are easy to care for,
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fit as expected. We walked all over Disney World for 5 days and my son only started complaining about his feet the last day. These shoes definitely saved his feet

customer_reviews.title: favorite brand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, I have a pair of Nano 4

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shoe that fits me right.
customer_reviews.text: Struggled find a shoe that fit correctly. I tried UA, Adidas, and Nike. I was somehow between a size 11 and 11.5 in all of them. Size 11 in these fit me perfect. They are light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Buy a little smaller
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes! Reebok are in my opinion making the most comfortable shoes on the market right now. These shoes are larger than what you would expect. Buy at least a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: TechBull805

customer_reviews.title: They're great if you don't mind replacing them 3 times a year...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 2 stars because they are amazingly comfortable. Otherwise, they are a 1. I'd like to kick the designer who came up with the idea of using "midsole" foam for the soles of shoes. (It's rampant in the industry right now.) The "outsole" is only slightly more abrasion resistant than my bare skin. At 4 months the soles of these shoes look like they're 4 years old. They might be OK if you spend most of your time inside a gym and running on a treadmill. Otherwise, you're going to have to replace them 3 times year. $79.99 is A LOT to spend for shoes with an effective lifespan of less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Have only had them for a week, but I like them a lot.

He is very active and sometimes tennis shoes can make his heels or arches sore. I was worried about switching brands, but these have been great for him. He wears them to school almost everyday. I've thrown them in the washing machine a few times too, and they're holding up well. Great shoe for a great price.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Zprint Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
A seamless upper and underfoot cushioning combine in this Reebok zprint run for the perfect blend of lightweight athletic action, comfort, and style. The decoupled bottom dissipates shock, and the dual-compound outsole flexes where you need it without sacrificing durability.

Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
